body_html:
i can also move the line Mailing.update_all(seasons: [Season.current.name]) from
20150625085615_add_seasons_to_mailings.rb to 20151205133354_add_project_proposal_dates_to_seasons.rb

it alters the migrations, but i think there is no way to fix this without changing the migrations.

body:
i can also move the line `Mailing.update_all(seasons: [Season.current.name])` from 
`20150625085615_add_seasons_to_mailings.rb` to `20151205133354_add_project_proposal_dates_to_seasons.rb`

it alters the migrations, but i think there is no way to fix this without changing the migrations.
